verses.verse: ק֥וּמִי <S%H6965><s%> Arise א֖וֹרִי <S%H215><s%> shine כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֣א <S%H935><s%> is come אוֹרֵ֑ךְ <S%H216><s%> for thy light וּכְב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עָלַ֥יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and זָרָֽח׃ <S%H2224><s%> is risen

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הַחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> For behold the darkness יְכַסֶּה־ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וַעֲרָפֶ֖ל <S%H6205><s%> and gross darkness לְאֻמִּ֑ים <S%H3816><s%> the people וְעָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and יִזְרַ֣ח <S%H2224><s%> shall arise יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD וּכְבוֹד֖וֹ <S%H3519><s%> upon thee and his glory עָלַ֥יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> and יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> shall be seen

וְהָלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> shall come גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> And the Gentiles לְאוֹרֵ֑ךְ <S%H216><s%> to thy light וּמְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> and kings לְנֹ֥גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> to the brightness זַרְחֵֽךְ׃ <S%H2225><s%> of thy rising

שְׂאִֽי־ <S%H5375><s%> Lift up סָבִ֤יב <S%H5439><s%> round about עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וּרְאִ֔י <S%H7200><s%> and see כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> all נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <S%H6908><s%> all they gather themselves together בָֽאוּ־ <S%H935><s%> they come לָ֑ךְ בָּנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> to thee thy sons מֵרָח֣וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far יָבֹ֔אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come וּבְנֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in צַ֥ד <S%H6654><s%> at [thy] side תֵּאָמַֽנָה׃ <S%H539><s%> shall be nursed

אָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> Then תִּרְאִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> will see וְנָהַ֔רְתְּ <S%H5102><s%> and flow together וּפָחַ֥ד <S%H6342><s%> shall fear וְרָחַ֖ב <S%H7337><s%> and be enlarged לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <S%H3824><s%> and thine heart כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יֵהָפֵ֤ךְ <S%H2015><s%> shall be converted עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and הֲמ֣וֹן <S%H1995><s%> because the abundance יָ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea חֵ֥יל <S%H2428><s%> unto thee the forces גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles יָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come לָֽךְ׃

שִֽׁפְעַ֨ת <S%H8229><s%> The multitude גְּמַלִּ֜ים <S%H1581><s%> of camels תְּכַסֵּ֗ךְ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover בִּכְרֵ֤י <S%H1070><s%> thee the dromedaries מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian וְעֵיפָ֔ה <S%H5891><s%> and Ephah כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> All מִשְּׁבָ֣א <S%H7614><s%> all they from Sheba יָבֹ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come זָהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <S%H3828><s%> and incense יִשָּׂ֔אוּ <S%H5375><s%> they shall bring וּתְהִלֹּ֥ת <S%H8416><s%> the praises יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְבַשֵּֽׂרוּ׃ <S%H1319><s%> and they shall shew forth

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All צֹ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> All the flocks קֵדָר֙ <S%H6938><s%> of Kedar יִקָּ֣בְצוּ <S%H6908><s%> shall be gathered together לָ֔ךְ אֵילֵ֥י <S%H352><s%> unto thee the rams נְבָי֖וֹת <S%H5032><s%> of Nebaioth יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <S%H8334><s%> shall minister יַעֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> unto thee they shall come up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with רָצוֹן֙ <S%H7522><s%> with acceptance מִזְבְּחִ֔י <S%H4196><s%> on mine altar וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house תִּפְאַרְתִּ֖י <S%H8597><s%> of my glory אֲפָאֵֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> and I will glorify

מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> are these כָּעָ֣ב <S%H5645><s%> as a cloud תְּעוּפֶ֑ינָה <S%H5774><s%> Who [are] these [that] fly וְכַיּוֹנִ֖ים <S%H3123><s%> and as the doves אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲרֻבֹּתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H699><s%> chimney

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely לִ֣י ׀ אִיִּ֣ים <S%H339><s%> Surely the isles יְקַוּ֗וּ <S%H6960><s%> shall wait וָאֳנִיּ֤וֹת <S%H591><s%> for me and the ships תַּרְשִׁישׁ֙ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <S%H7223><s%> first לְהָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> to bring בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1121><s%> thy sons מֵֽרָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> from far כַּסְפָּ֥ם <S%H3701><s%> their silver וּזְהָבָ֖ם <S%H2091><s%> and their gold אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> For לְשֵׁם֙ <S%H8034><s%> with them unto the name יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהַ֔יִךְ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> and to the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <S%H6286><s%> because he hath glorified

וּבָנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> shall build up בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons נֵכָר֙ <S%H5236><s%> of strangers חֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> thy walls וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> and their kings יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <S%H8334><s%> shall minister כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> in בְקִצְפִּי֙ <S%H7110><s%> unto thee for in my wrath הִכִּיתִ֔יךְ <S%H5221><s%> I smote וּבִרְצוֹנִ֖י <S%H7522><s%> thee but in my favour רִֽחַמְתִּֽיךְ׃ <S%H7355><s%> have I had mercy

וּפִתְּח֨וּ <S%H6605><s%> shall be open שְׁעָרַ֧יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> Therefore thy gates תָּמִ֛יד <S%H8548><s%> continually יוֹמָ֥ם <S%H3119><s%> day וָלַ֖יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> nor night לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִסָּגֵ֑רוּ <S%H5462><s%> they shall not be shut לְהָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> that [men] may bring אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H413><s%> to you חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> unto thee the forces גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> and [that] their kings נְהוּגִֽים׃ <S%H5090><s%> [may be] brought

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הַגּ֧וֹי <S%H1471><s%> For the nation וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <S%H4467><s%> and kingdom אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעַבְד֖וּךְ <S%H5647><s%> that will not serve יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> thee shall perish וְהַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> yea [those] nations חָרֹ֥ב <S%H2717><s%> shall be utterly יֶחֱרָֽבוּ׃ <S%H2717><s%> wasted

כְּב֤וֹד <S%H3519><s%> The glory הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon אֵלַ֣יִךְ <S%H413><s%> about יָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come בְּר֛וֹשׁ <S%H1265><s%> unto thee the fir tree תִּדְהָ֥ר <S%H8410><s%> the pine tree וּתְאַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H8391><s%> and the box יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together לְפָאֵר֙ <S%H6286><s%> to beautify מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the place מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> of my sanctuary וּמְק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and I will make the place רַגְלַ֖י <S%H7272><s%> of my feet אֲכַבֵּֽד׃ <S%H3513><s%> glorious

וְהָלְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> thee shall come אֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> about שְׁח֙וֹחַ֙ <S%H7817><s%> bending בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> The sons מְעַנַּ֔יִךְ <S%H6031><s%> also of them that afflicted וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <S%H7812><s%> thee shall bow themselves down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at כַּפּ֥וֹת <S%H3709><s%> at the soles רַגְלַ֖יִךְ <S%H7272><s%> of thy feet כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מְנַֽאֲצָ֑יִךְ <S%H5006><s%> unto thee and all they that despised וְקָ֤רְאוּ <S%H7121><s%> and they shall call לָךְ֙ עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> thee The city יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> The Zion קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> of the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

תַּ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> Whereas הֱיוֹתֵ֛ךְ <S%H1961><s%> have been עֲזוּבָ֥ה <S%H5805><s%> forsaking וּשְׂנוּאָ֖ה <S%H8130><s%> and hated וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> no עוֹבֵ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> so that no man went through וְשַׂמְתִּיךְ֙ <S%H7760><s%> [thee] I will make לִגְא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> excellency עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> thee an eternal מְשׂ֖וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> a joy דּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

וְיָנַקְתְּ֙ <S%H3243><s%> Thou shalt also suck חֲלֵ֣ב <S%H2461><s%> the milk גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the Gentiles וְשֹׁ֥ד <S%H7699><s%> the breast מְלָכִ֖ים <S%H4428><s%> of kings תִּינָ֑קִי <S%H3243><s%> and shalt suck וְיָדַ֗עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that I the LORD מֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֔ךְ <S%H3467><s%> [am] thy Saviour וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1350><s%> and thy Redeemer אֲבִ֥יר <S%H46><s%> the mighty One יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob

תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Instead הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> For brass אָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> I will bring זָהָ֗ב <S%H2091><s%> gold וְתַ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> and instead הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> and for iron אָ֣בִיא <S%H935><s%> I will bring כֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְתַ֤חַת <S%H8478><s%> and instead הָֽעֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> and for wood נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> brass וְתַ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> and instead הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <S%H68><s%> and for stones בַּרְזֶ֑ל <S%H1270><s%> iron וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <S%H7760><s%> I will also make פְקֻדָּתֵךְ֙ <S%H6486><s%> thy officers שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace וְנֹגְשַׂ֖יִךְ <S%H5065><s%> and thine exactors צְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> righteousness

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִשָּׁמַ֨ע <S%H8085><s%> shall no more be heard ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again חָמָס֙ <S%H2555><s%> Violence בְּאַרְצֵ֔ךְ <S%H776><s%> in thy land שֹׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> wasting וָשֶׁ֖בֶר <S%H7667><s%> nor destruction בִּגְבוּלָ֑יִךְ <S%H1366><s%> within thy borders וְקָרָ֤את <S%H7121><s%> but thou shalt call יְשׁוּעָה֙ <S%H3444><s%> Salvation חוֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> thy walls וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <S%H8179><s%> and thy gates תְּהִלָּֽה׃ <S%H8416><s%> Praise לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become

לָּ֨ךְ ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <S%H8121><s%> The sun לְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> shall be no more thy light יוֹמָ֔ם <S%H3119><s%> by day וּלְנֹ֕גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> neither for brightness הַיָּרֵ֖חַ <S%H3394><s%> shall the moon לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יָאִ֣יר <S%H215><s%> light לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָה־ <S%H1961><s%> have לָ֤ךְ יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto thee but the LORD לְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> give light עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be unto thee an everlasting וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <S%H430><s%> and thy God לְתִפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <S%H8597><s%> thy glory

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall no more go down עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer שִׁמְשֵׁ֔ךְ <S%H8121><s%> Thy sun וִירֵחֵ֖ךְ <S%H3391><s%> neither shall thy moon לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor יֵאָסֵ֑ף <S%H622><s%> withdraw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> itself for the LORD יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> will have לָּךְ֙ לְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> light עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be thine everlasting וְשָׁלְמ֖וּ <S%H7999><s%> shall be ended יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> and the days אֶבְלֵֽךְ׃ <S%H60><s%> of thy mourning

וְעַמֵּךְ֙ <S%H5971><s%> Thy people כֻּלָּ֣ם <S%H3605><s%> all צַדִּיקִ֔ים <S%H6662><s%> also [shall be] all righteous לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> they shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land נֵ֧צֶר <S%H5342><s%> the branch [מַטָּעֹו כ] (מַטָּעַ֛י <S%H4302><s%> garden ק) מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדַ֖י <S%H3027><s%> of my hands לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> that I may be glorified

הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> A little one יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לָאֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> shall become a thousand וְהַצָּעִ֖יר <S%H6810><s%> and a small one לְג֣וֹי <S%H1471><s%> nation עָצ֑וּם <S%H6099><s%> a strong אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I the LORD בְּעִתָּ֥הּ <S%H6256><s%> it in his time אֲחִישֶֽׁנָּה׃ <S%H2363><s%> will hasten ס
